reference_a:
@article{grommisch2020,
  title = {Modeling individual differences in emotion regulation repertoire in daily life with multilevel latent profile analysis.},
  author = {Grommisch, Gloria and Koval, Peter and Hinton, Jordan D. X. and Gleeson, John and Hollenstein, Tom and Kuppens, Peter and Lischetzke, Tanja},
  date = {2020-12},
  journaltitle = {Emotion},
  shortjournal = {Emotion},
  volume = {20},
  number = {8},
  pages = {1462--1474},
  issn = {1931-1516, 1528-3542},
  doi = {10.1037/emo0000669}
}
additional_comments: no beep information available; variable distraction is missing; data from FEEL project; sliders initialized at 50; subset of larger dataset available upon request in the EMOTE database (https://emotedatabase.com/datasets/21)

features.name: counter
features.coding: Running number of measurement occasion per id
features.details: Running number of measurement occasion per id

features.name: happy
features.coding:
Feeling happy at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling happy at moment of prompt

features.name: relaxed
features.coding:
Feeling relaxed at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling relaxed at moment of prompt
features.construct: relaxation, positive affect, affect, neuroticism, big five

features.name: confident
features.coding:
Feeling confident at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling confident at moment of prompt
features.construct: confidence, self-efficacy, positive affect, affect, big five, extraversion

features.name: sad
features.coding:
Feeling sad at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling sad at moment of prompt

features.name: stressed
features.coding:
Feeling stressed at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling stressed at moment of prompt

features.name: angry
features.coding:
Feeling angry at moment of prompt
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Feeling angry at moment of prompt

features.name: situation_selection
features.coding:
Since last survey, I chose which situation to put myself in
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I chose which situation to put myself in

features.name: situation_modification
features.coding:
Since last survey, I actively changed something in the situation
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I actively changed something in the situation

features.name: reappraisal
features.coding:
Since last survey, I changed the way I was thinking about the situation
Since last survey, I took a step back and looked at things from a different perspective.
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details:
Mean of two items: 
Since last survey, I changed the way I was thinking about the situation
Since last survey, I took a step back and looked at things from a different perspective.

features.name: acceptance
features.coding:
Since last survey, I accepted my emotions as valid and important
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I accepted my emotions as valid and important

features.name: rumination
features.coding:
Since last survey, I thought over and over again about my emotions
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I thought over and over again about my emotions

features.name: social_sharing
features.coding:
Since last survey, I talked with someone about my emotions
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I talked with someone about my emotions
features.construct: emotional expression, emotion regulation, social support

features.name: ignoring
features.coding:
Since last survey, I ignored my emotions
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I ignored my emotions

features.name: suppression
features.coding:
Since last survey, I was careful not to express my emotions to others
0 = not at all
100 = very much
features.details: Since last survey, I was careful not to express my emotions to others
